Smile It's a Costa Rican Coffee

Freelance - Oct 2017-Sep 2018

"Smile It's a Costa Rican Coffee" is a Specialty Coffee producer from Tarrazu, Costa Rica. I took over the content creation department, producing and shooting all web-based material. This included all photographs, videos and promotional content. Working alongisde the art department it was also our responsability to create the digital identity of the brand.

SKILLS

Art-Direction, Photography, Videography


Tools

Adobe CC, DSLR


Team Members

Rocio Chacon

Photography


My main goal with every photograph that we took was to include the main concept of the brand: quality, happiness and respect for nature. For this we worked alongside the hand-pickers and the staff to create a series of portraits and product shots while the coffee was being picked and delivered for the toasting process.

Photography


My main goal with every photograph that we took was to include the main concept of the brand: quality, happiness and respect for nature. For this we worked alongside the hand-pickers and the staff to create a series of portraits and product shots while the coffee was being picked and delivered for the toasting process.

GIFs & Illustration


A very important aspect of the brand is its playfulness. For this we decided that illustrations and GIFs would be a perfect medium to communicate simple ideas in our social platforms.

Video


For the brand I produced a series of small videos to showcase the process of harvesting the coffee. This was incredibly important to explain the different stages the coffee producers have to make to create a Gourmet product.

Video


For the brand I produced a series of small videos to showcase the process of harvesting the coffee. This was incredibly important to explain the different stages the coffee producers have to make to create a Gourmet product.

Digital Presence


Digital Presence was one of the most important elements of our work, since the only way to buy this Specialty Coffee is through the internet. For this we combined all mediums mentioned above to create a dinamic interaction with the customers.

Digital Presence



Animated Logo


To bring more freshness to the logo we created an animated version of it to use in a more playfull manner or in social media

Animated Logo


To bring more freshness to the logo we created an animated version of it to use in a more playfull manner or in social media

Giweaways


As a marketing strategy we partner with local influencers to create giveaways to the community
